verses.verse: שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> O Israel אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> You עֹבֵ֤ר <WH5674> Thou [art] to pass over הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> this day אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan לָבֹא֙ <WH935> to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> nations גְּדֹלִ֥ים <WH1419> greater וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <WH6099> and mightier מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <WH4480> than עָרִ֛ים <WH5892> than thyself cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <WH1419> great וּבְצֻרֹ֖ת <WH1219> and fenced up בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> to heaven

עַֽם־ <WH5971> A people גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> great וָרָ֖ם <WH7311> and tall בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children עֲנָקִ֑ים <WH6062> of the Anakims אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH3045> whom thou knowest וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you שָׁמַ֔עְתָּ <WH8085> and [of whom] thou hast heard מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יִתְיַצֵּ֔ב <WH3320> [say] Who can stand לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children עֲנָֽק׃ <WH6061> of Anak

וְיָדַעְתָּ֣ <WH3045> Understand הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> therefore this day כִּי֩ <WH3588> that it יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God הֽוּא־ <WH1931> who הָעֹבֵ֤ר <WH5674> [is] he which goeth over לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire אֹֽכְלָ֔ה <WH398> thee [as] a consuming ה֧וּא <WH1931> He יַשְׁמִידֵ֛ם <WH8045> he shall destroy וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and He יַכְנִיעֵ֖ם <WH3665> them and he shall bring them down לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before thy face וְהֽוֹרַשְׁתָּ֤ם <WH3423> so shalt thou drive them out וְהַֽאַבַדְתָּם֙ <WH6> and destroy מַהֵ֔ר <WH4118> them quickly כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD לָֽךְ׃

אַל־ <WH408> not תֹּאמַ֣ר <WH559> Speak בִּלְבָבְךָ֗ <WH3824> not thou in thine heart בַּהֲדֹ֣ף <WH1920> hath cast them out יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> after that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֨יךָ <WH430> thy God אֹתָ֥ם ׀ <WH853> מִלְּפָנֶיךָ֮ <WH6440> from before לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> thee saying בְּצִדְקָתִי֙ <WH6666> For my righteousness הֱבִיאַ֣נִי <WH935> hath brought me in יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וּבְרִשְׁעַת֙ <WH3423> doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> of these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> of these יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD מוֹרִישָׁ֥ם <WH7564> but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> from before

לֹ֣א <WH3808> for בְצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <WH6666> Not for thy righteousness וּבְיֹ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH3476> or for the uprightness לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <WH3824> of thine heart אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָ֖א <WH935> dost thou go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> their land כִּ֞י <WH3588> because בְּרִשְׁעַ֣ת ׀ <WH3423> doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> of these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> of these יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God מוֹרִישָׁ֣ם <WH7564> but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> from before וּלְמַ֜עַן <WH4616> order הָקִ֣ים <WH6965> thee and that he may perform אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> and Jacob

וְיָדַעְתָּ֗ <WH3045> Understand כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> because בְצִדְקָֽתְךָ֙ <WH6666> it for thy righteousness יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> therefore that the LORD אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֨ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֜ אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> land הַטּוֹבָ֛ה <WH2896> thee not this good הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> to possess כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עַם־ <WH5971> people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> churlish עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> stiff-necked אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

זְכֹר֙ <WH2142> Remember אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁכַּ֔ח <WH7911> [and] forget אֵ֧ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you הִקְצַ֛פְתָּ <WH7107> to wrath אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> not how thou provokedst the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness לְמִן־ <WH4480> from הַיּ֞וֹם <WH3117> the day אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you יָצָ֣אתָ ׀ <WH3318> that thou didst depart out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּֽאֲכֶם֙ <WH935> until ye came עַד־ <WH5704> until הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> unto this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this מַמְרִ֥ים <WH4784> ye have been rebellious הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> have been עִם־ <WH5973> against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וּבְחֹרֵ֥ב <WH2722> Also in Horeb הִקְצַפְתֶּ֖ם <WH7107> to wrath אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּתְאַנַּ֧ף <WH599> was angry יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> so that the LORD בָּכֶ֖ם לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> with you to have destroyed אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

בַּעֲלֹתִ֣י <WH5927> When I was gone up הָהָ֗רָה <WH2022> into the mount לָקַ֜חַת <WH3947> to receive לוּחֹ֤ת <WH3871> the tables הָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> of stone לוּחֹ֣ת <WH3871> [even] the tables הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which כָּרַ֥ת <WH3772> made יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> with וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> with you then I abode בָּהָ֗ר <WH2022> in the mount אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty יוֹם֙ <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> and forty לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> nights לֶ֚חֶם <WH3899> bread לֹ֣א <WH3808> neither אָכַ֔לְתִּי <WH398> I neither did eat וּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> water לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor שָׁתִֽיתִי׃ <WH8354> nor drink

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> unto me two לוּחֹ֣ת <WH3871> tables הָֽאֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> of stone כְּתֻבִ֖ים <WH3789> written בְּאֶצְבַּ֣ע <WH676> with the finger אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַעֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> and on כְּֽכָל־ <WH3605> them all הַדְּבָרִ֡ים <WH1697> and on them [was written] according to all the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּר֩ <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֥ם <WH5973> at בָּהָ֛ר <WH2022> with you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of the fire בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day הַקָּהָֽל׃ <WH6951> of the assembly

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came מִקֵּץ֙ <WH7093> And it came to pass at the end אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> of forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> and forty לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> nights נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> gave יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֛י <WH8147> me the two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> tables הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> of stone לֻח֥וֹת <WH3871> [even] the tables הַבְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> of the covenant

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me ק֣וּם <WH6965> unto me Arise רֵ֤ד <WH3381> get thee down מַהֵר֙ <WH4118> quickly מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> here כִּ֚י <WH3588> for שִׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> from hence for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הוֹצֵ֖אתָ <WH3318> which thou hast brought forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt סָ֣רוּ <WH5493> turned aside מַהֵ֗ר <WH4118> [themselves] they are quickly מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <WH6680> which I commanded עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> them they have made לָהֶ֖ם מַסֵּכָֽה׃ <WH4541> them a molten image

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Furthermore the LORD אֵלַ֣י <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto me saying רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and indeed עַם־ <WH5971> people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> churlish עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> stiff-necked הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

הֶ֤רֶף <WH7503> Let me alone מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <WH4480> than וְאַשְׁמִידֵ֔ם <WH8045> that I may destroy וְאֶמְחֶ֣ה <WH4229> them and blot out אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמָ֔ם <WH8034> their name מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> from under heaven וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> and I will make אֽוֹתְךָ֔ <WH854> of לְגוֹי־ <WH1471> thee a nation עָצ֥וּם <WH6099> mightier וָרָ֖ב <WH7227> and greater מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> than

וָאֵ֗פֶן <WH6437> So I turned וָֽאֵרֵד֙ <WH3381> and came down מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> from the mount וְהָהָ֖ר <WH2022> and the mount בֹּעֵ֣ר <WH1197> burned בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire וּשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> and the two לֻחֹ֣ת <WH3871> tables הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant עַ֖ל <WH5921> were in שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> [were] in my two יָדָֽי׃ <WH3027> hands

וָאֵ֗רֶא <WH7200> And I looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> you had indeed חֲטָאתֶם֙ <WH2398> and behold ye had sinned לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God עֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <WH6213> [and] had made לָכֶ֔ם עֵ֖גֶל <WH5695> calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> you a molten סַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH5493> ye had turned aside מַהֵ֔ר <WH4118> quickly מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֕רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וָאֶתְפֹּשׂ֙ <WH8610> And I took בִּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> the two הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> tables וָֽאַשְׁלִכֵ֔ם <WH7993> and cast מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> them out of שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> my two יָדָ֑י <WH3027> hands וָאֲשַׁבְּרֵ֖ם <WH7665> and brake לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> them before your eyes

וָֽאֶתְנַפַּל֩ <WH5307> And I fell down לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD כָּרִאשֹׁנָ֗ה <WH7223> as at the first אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty יוֹם֙ <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> and forty לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> nights לֶ֚חֶם <WH3899> bread לֹ֣א <WH3808> neither אָכַ֔לְתִּי <WH398> I did neither eat וּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> water לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor שָׁתִ֑יתִי <WH8354> nor drink עַ֤ל <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all חַטַּאתְכֶם֙ <WH2403> because of all your sins אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חֲטָאתֶ֔ם <WH2398> which ye sinned לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> in doing הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> wickedly בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <WH3707> to provoke him to anger

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יָגֹ֗רְתִּי <WH3025> For I was afraid מִפְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> of הָאַף֙ <WH639> the anger וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ה <WH2534> and hot displeasure אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which קָצַ֧ף <WH7107> was wroth יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> wherewith the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against לְהַשְׁמִ֣יד <WH8045> against you to destroy אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> hearkened יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> you But the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about גַּ֖ם <WH1571> also בַּפַּ֥עַם <WH6471> unto me at that time הַהִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וּֽבְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> with Aaron הִתְאַנַּ֧ף <WH599> angry יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> was very לְהַשְׁמִיד֑וֹ <WH8045> to have destroyed וָֽאֶתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <WH6419> him and I prayed גַּם־ <WH1571> also בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> for אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> for Aaron בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> also the same time הַהִֽוא׃ <WH1931> the same

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> חַטַּאתְכֶ֞ם <WH2403> your sin אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <WH6213> which ye had made אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֵ֗גֶל <WH5695> the calf לָקַחְתִּי֮ <WH3947> And I took וָאֶשְׂרֹ֣ף <WH8313> and burnt אֹת֣וֹ ׀ <WH853> בָּאֵשׁ֒ <WH784> it with fire וָאֶכֹּ֨ת <WH3807> and stamped אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> טָחוֹן֙ <WH2912> it [and] ground הֵיטֵ֔ב <WH3190> [it] very small עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דַּ֖ק <WH1851> dwarf לְעָפָ֑ר <WH6083> as dust וָֽאַשְׁלִךְ֙ <WH7993> and I cast אֶת־ <WH853> עֲפָר֔וֹ <WH6083> the dust אֶל־ <WH413> into הַנַּ֖חַל <WH5158> thereof into the brook הַיֹּרֵ֥ד <WH3381> that descended out מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> of the mount

וּבְתַבְעֵרָה֙ <WH8404> And at Taberah וּבְמַסָּ֔ה <WH4532> and at Massah וּבְקִבְרֹ֖ת הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH6914> and at Kibrothhattaavah מַקְצִפִ֥ים <WH7107> to wrath הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> become אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> ye provoked the LORD

וּבִשְׁלֹ֨חַ <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Likewise when the LORD אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> מִקָּדֵ֤שׁ בַּרְנֵ֙עַ֙ <WH6947> you from Kadeshbarnea לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying עֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> Go up וּרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָכֶ֑ם וַתַּמְר֗וּ <WH4784> you then ye rebelled אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֤י <WH6310> against the commandment יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> neither הֶֽאֱמַנְתֶּם֙ <WH539> and ye believed ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> him not nor hearkened בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <WH6963> to his voice

מַמְרִ֥ים <WH4784> Ye have been rebellious הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> have been עִם־ <WH5973> against יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD מִיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> from the day דַּעְתִּ֥י <WH3045> that I knew אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וָֽאֶתְנַפַּ֞ל <WH5307> Thus I fell down לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵ֣ת <WH853> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> days וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> and forty הַלַּ֖יְלָה <WH3915> nights אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִתְנַפָּ֑לְתִּי <WH5307> as I fell down כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אָמַ֥ר <WH559> had said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [at the first] because the LORD לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> he would destroy אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

זְכֹר֙ <WH2142> Remember לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> thy servants לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> and Jacob אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֗פֶן <WH6437> look אֶל־ <WH413> at קְשִׁי֙ <WH7190> not unto the stubbornness הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this וְאֶל־ <WH413> to רִשְׁע֖וֹ <WH7562> nor to their wickedness וְאֶל־ <WH413> to חַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <WH2403> nor to their sin
